!Guard Leikan: If you follow this road northeast, you will come to the Grim Ruins. Originally, it was the village of Bernice, where I was born, but it was reduced to ashes by the war. If you see its ghastly state, you will understand why it's now called the *Grim Ruins*. If you pass the ruins and continue north, you will arrive at the *forest where the Dark Elves live*. Although I've never gone there myself... Travelers say that it is dark and eerie in a very unnatural way.
